thread.title: The secret ‘McBain’ movie hidden inside ‘The Simpsons’ is its best joke yet | For The Win
thread.title_full: The secret ‘McBain’ movie hidden inside ‘The Simpsons’ is its best joke yet | For The Win

author: Luke Kerr-Dineen
title: The secret ‘McBain’ movie hidden inside ‘The Simpsons’ is its best joke yet | For The Win
text:
Follow @LukeKerrDineen 
The Simpsons has been popping around in the news a lot recently, largely because it appears to offer a glimpse into the future. It didn’t just predict that Donald Trump would become President one day , after all, it also nailed Lady Gaga’s Super Bowl halftime performance and finished it all by sneaking-in a subtle Falcons joke. 
Now, it’s leading fans to re-discover one of the show’s best-ever secret jokes: The hidden McBain movie. 
McBain is a fictional character within the show; a movie actor, one we only see in fleeting glances (usually at the start of the show) of his various action movies. But that’s where it gets interesting: Take all the apparent toss-away clips, stitch them together, and what you’ll be left with is a fully coherent miniature movie, with plot lines and everything. That’s right: The Simpsons literally HID A SECRET MOVIE INSIDE A TELEVISION SHOW. 
The proof:
